import React from 'react' import '../Components/MovieBox.css' import { poster_img400 } from './config' const MovieBox = ({list,title,name,original_language,id,poster,date,media_type, vote_average,overview,release_date}) => { return (
{vote_average} {/* */}

{title || name}

{original_language} {media_type}
ID : {id} Name : {title || name} Original Language : {original_language} Date : {date} Media Type : {media_type} Vote Average : {vote_average}
Over
{overview} {release_date}
) } export default MovieBox
